ComicInfo.Summary:
When a fiery explosion erupts in the ancient city of Petra, Jasmine races against the terrorist group The Forty Thieves to prevent the shattered pieces of the Crown of Kings, an object that haunts her past, from being reunited and unleashing an unearthly power on the world and all that she holds dear.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Caanan White & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Sergio Davila & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | C | Cover C | Jay Anacleto & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Allan Otero & Grostieta | 4 | E | Secret Exclusive Variant Cover | Jay Anacleto (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing | G | Denver Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
